Html:
i have created a series of maps using GMap.NET, i have loaded a map to a tablet and i run a custom program we have at our company with the map. the map uses gps to track the route of the tablet, and i have an external gps used to boast the signal, but when the tablet is moving the map will show that you are not were you should be; sometimes it shows the location a full state away. when in-route, this is a problem.

is there a reason why the map is not following the route and jumps around to the wrong location?
filter your gps points where HDOP < xxx
